pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, November 26, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Regina, Saskatchewan

1:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Regina, Michael Fougere.

Office of the Mayor
City Hall
2476 Victoria Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Saskatchewan, Scott Moe.

Office of the Premier
Room 226
2405 Legislative Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
